eventParts.text: Are those military birds up ahead?
I, uh… I’m not sure. Let’s go around them.
You’ve got a lot of nerve coming back here after running away!
Yeah! We needed you when those vultures showed up, and you just disappeared!

eventConsequence.selectionText: Alex has been helping us fighting the vultures ever since we first met! He’s a great bird and without him we wouldn’t have gotten this far!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Thank you. I know I haven’t always done the right thing, but I’m trying to get better.

Alex gains +2 confidence!

eventConsequence.selectionText: Did you really run from a fight, Alex? I always thought you were so confident.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
I did run, and I’m not proud of it. The vultures really scare me sometimes.

Alex gains +2 caution!
